reviews.review_msg: Doesnt' want to teach / help. Makes it hard to get help. Union attitude. Will do as little as can get away with and nothing more. Doesn't make helpful comments on papers just negative criticism. Waste of money and insulting. Everyone I know taking this course thinks she is the worst they've had and thinks she's mean. Complains about her job also.
Don't get you guys. Brilliant; careful; wanted students to think for themselves with challenging material.

Yes,slow marker there was a at problem in another class.lectures didn't cover what the pieces meant,BUT it was not her job to hold our hands through a mandatory course for an Engl major.we talked outside of class time,and she was a huge help.very caring!
Brilliant Maybe Time to retire YES expects to much YES Hostile Discussion Enviro
